formElement.label: vCloudDirector Connection:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for vCloudDirector. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: vCloudDirector Organization:
formElement.documentation: Name of the organization that contains the virtual datacenter and the catalog. This must reference an existing Organization in vCloud Director.

formElement.label: Template Catalog:
formElement.documentation: Name of the catalog that will contain the vApp template.

formElement.label: Virtual Data Center:
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual datacenter that contains the vApp that will be used.

formElement.label: Source vApp Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the vApp that will be used.

formElement.label: New Template Name:
formElement.documentation: Name for the new vApp template.

formElement.label: New Template Description:
formElement.documentation: Description for the new vApp template.
